lead_paragraph: DOLLINGER--Matthew, 73, beloved husband of Diana; loving father of Joyce, Neal, Alicia, Kenny and Marc; grandfather of Adam, Sam, Brandon and Samantha; great-grandfather of Jeremy and Ayla. A renowned attorney respected by all. 1/3
